pages.title: Kamen Rider Kurokage Shin
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim: Great Soccer Battle! Golden Fruits Cup! (2014, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver_kurokage_shin)Genesis Driver (Kurokage Shin)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Genesis Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength II
